OCBC is the first bank in Singapore to launch its own Artificial Intelligence unit in 2018 called the Al Lab . Kickstart your career and deep dive into Al upon graduation with a one-year rotation with OCBC . students currently enrolled in Al-related postgraduate degrees in NUS, NTU and SMU .
